title: Docker Automation with Dockerfiles (Windows)
lead: Learn how to automate the build of a custom Windows-based Docker image from a Dockerfile.
description: This workshop will show you how to automate the building and configuring of a Windows-based Docker image by utilizing Dockerfiles.  You will construct a Dockerfile by mimicking a production environment configuration. You'll also learn some of the options for a Dockerfile configuration.
learn: Constructing a Dockerfile for Windows-based Builds
Building a Docker Image from a Dockerfile
author: Joshua Davis
